member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.DatasetName
member.summary: The data set name of the event.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.DatasetRecords
member.summary: The map of data set records for the event.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.IdentityId
member.summary: The identity pool ID associated with the data set.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.IdentityPoolId
member.summary: The identity pool ID associated with the data set.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.Region
member.summary: The region in which data set resides.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.DatasetRecord
member.summary: Data set records for the event.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.CognitoEvents.CognitoEvent.DatasetRecord.Op
member.summary: The operation associated with the record. For a new record or any updates to existing record it is set to "replace". For deleting a record it is set to "remove".
